members.name: IDBOpenDBRequest.onblocked
members.description: The event handler for the blocked event. This event is triggered when the upgradeneeded event should be triggered because of a version change but the database is still in use (i.e. not closed) somewhere, even after the versionchange event was sent.

members.name: IDBOpenDBRequest.onupgradeneeded
members.description: The event handler for the upgradeneeded event, fired when a database of a bigger version number than the existing stored database is loaded.

parameters.name: IDBRequest.error Read only
parameters.description: Returns an error in the event of an unsuccessful request, indicating what went wrong.

parameters.name: IDBRequest.result Read only
parameters.description: Returns the result of the request. If the the request failed and the result is not available, an InvalidStateError exception is thrown.

parameters.name: IDBRequest.source Read only
parameters.description: The source of the request, such as an IDBIndex or an IDBObjectStore. If no source exists (such as when calling IDBFactory.open), it returns null.

parameters.name: IDBRequest.readyState Read only
parameters.description: The state of the request. Every request starts in the pendingÂ state. The state changes to done when the request completes successfully or when an error occurs.

parameters.name: IDBRequest.transaction Read only
parameters.description: The transaction for the request. This property can be null for certain requests, for example those returned from IDBFactory.open unless an upgrade is needed. (You're just connecting to a database, so there is no transaction to return).

parameters.name: IDBRequest.onerror
parameters.description: The event handler for the error event.

parameters.name: IDBRequest.onsuccess
parameters.description: The event handler for the success event.
